entry.title: Responsible AI Use - The Line Between Tool and Replacement
entry.summary: There's a conversation we need to have about AI, and it's not the one you might expect. It's not about whether AI will take your job, or whether it's getting too smart, or when we'll have general artificial intelligence.

entry.title: AI Ethics - Why Your Business Needs Clear Guidelines
entry.summary: If you're running a business and thinking about bringing AI into your operations, you've probably heard plenty about what AI can do for you. Automate this, optimize that, predict the other thing. It's all very exciting, and honestly, a lot of it is true. AI can be incredibly powerful.

entry.title: Welcome to SadSumo Consulting - Here's What We're Building
entry.summary: Hey there! Welcome to the SadSumo Consulting blog. I'm really excited to share what we're working on and where we're headed.
